text: This is a list of regions of Bangladesh by Human Development Index as of 2018. == List == Districts of Bangladesh by HDI in 2018 --- {| class="wikitable sortable" ! class="sort" |Rank ! class="sort" |Regions (Districts) ! class="sort" |HDI (2018) ! class="unsortable" |Comparable countries (2018) |- ! colspan="4" style="color:#fc0;" |Medium human development |- |1 |Dhaka |0.695 | |- |2 | style="text-align:left" |Barisal, Jhalokati, Pirojpur |0.672 |, |- |3 |Gopalganj, Madaripur, Munshiganj, Shariatpur |0.649 |, , |- |4 | style="text-align:left" |Chittagong |0.648 | |- |5 |Jessore, Magura, Narail |0.622 |, |- |6 | style="text-align:left" |Bagerhat, Khulna, Satkhira |0.620 |, , |- | rowspan="2" |7 | style="text- align:left" |Brahmanbaria, Chandpur, Comilla |0.614 | |- |Dinajpur, Nilphamari, Panchagarh, Thakurgaon |0.614 | |- style="background:#e6e6e6" |– | style="text-align:left" |'''''' |0.613 | |- |9 |Chuadanga, Jhenaidah, Kushtia, Meherpur |0.610 | |- |10 |Natore, Pabna, Sirajganj |0.606 |, |- | rowspan="3" |11 |Faridpur, Manikganj, Rajbari |0.596 | |- |Feni, Lakshmipur, Noakhali |0.596 | |- |Maulvibazar, Sylhet |0.596 | |- |14 |Khagrachhari, Rangamati Hill |0.593 | |- |15 |Kurigram, Lalmonirhat, Rangpur |0.591 | |- |16 | style="text- align:left" |Barguna, Bhola, Patuakhali |0.586 |, |- |17 |Naogaon, Chapai Nawabganj, Rajshahi |0.578 |, |- |18 |Jamalpur, Sherpur, Tangail |0.574 | |- |19 |Kishoreganj, Mymensingh, Netrakona |0.562 |, |- ! colspan="4" style="color:#900;" | Low human development |- |20 | style="text-align:left" |Bandarban, Cox's Bazar |0.538 | |- |21 |Habiganj, Sunamganj |0.535 |, |- |} == References == Bangladesh Human Development Index Regions by Human Development Index Bangladesh
